scripts.clean-x: rm -rf node_modules .turbo && cd apps/web && rm -rf node_modules .turbo .next && cd ../server && rm -rf node_modules .turbo dist && cd ../../packages/db &&  rm -rf node_modules .turbo dist && cd ../utils &&  rm -rf node_modules .turbo dist
scripts.deploy:render:build: npm install && npm run db:generate && turbo run build -F=@repo/db && turbo run build -F=@repo/utils && turbo run build -F=server
